Class BuilderIF

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--BuilderIF
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuilderEconomy
public abstract class BuilderIF
extends java.lang.Object

Factory class to create accounts and security managers. The structure follows the Builder pattern. Account and security manager are created by implementations.

See Also:
package account.
